data.news_body: Board of Directors of the Company have given their approval for issuance of Corporate Guarantee/Letter of Comfort/Post dated Cheques to secure loan to be provided by Banks/Financial Institutions/NBFCs to Lumax Yokowo Technologies Private Limited for an amount upto Rs. 5 Crores.

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date
data.news_body: The Board has approved and fixed the Cut-Off date as Friday November 21 2025 for determining the eligible Shareholders for sending notice and for the purpose of E-voting on the resolutions proposed in the draft Postal Ballot notice approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held today November 08 2025.

data.caption: Approval Of The Draft Notice Of Postal Ballot To Seek Approval Of The Shareholders Of The Company With Regard To The Re-Appointments Of Mr. Dhanesh Kumar Jain As Executive Chairman And Mr. Anmol Jain As Managing Director Of The Company
data.news_body: The Board of Directors have at their meeting held today i.e; on November 07 2025 have approved the draft notice of Postal Ballot to seek approval of the shareholders with regard to the re-appointments of Mr. Dhanesh Kumar Jain as Executive Chairman and Mr. Anmol Jain as Managing Director of the Company.

data.caption: Approval For Investment Of An Amount Up To Rs. 5 Crores (Rupees Five Crores Only) In The Form Of Optionally Convertible Redeemable Debentures (Ocrds) In Lumax Resources Private Limited A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of The Company As Recommended By The Audit C
data.news_body: The Board of Directors have approved an investment of upto Rs. 5 crores in the form of optionally convertible redeemable debentures in Lumax Resources Private Limited a wholly owned subsidiary of the Company as recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e; November 08 2025 have considered and approved the investment for an amount of upto Rs. 0.93 crores to acquire upto 26% stake in the equity share capital of Power Pulse Trading Solutions Limited

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held today i.e November 08 2025 have approved the Scheme of Arrangement for amalgamation of IAC International Automotive India Private Limited (Transferor Company) with Lumax Auto Technologies Limited (Transferee Company) on a going concern basis under Section 230-232 of the Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held today i.e. November 08 2025 have considered and approved the proposal for reappointments of Mr. Dhanesh Kumar Jain as the Executive Chairman - Whole Time Director for a period of 3 years w.e.f. May 28 2026 and Mr. Anmol Jain as the Managing Director of the Company for a period of 5 years w.e.f. May 28 2026 subject to the approval of shareholders of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
The Board of Director in their meeting held on May 29 2025 have approved the following changes in Senior Management Personnel (SMP):- 
1. Cessation of Mr. Ashish Dubey from the office of Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Key Managerial Personnel w.e.f the close of the Business hours of June 302025 consequent to attaining the age of superannuation. Accordingly Mr. Ashish Dubey will cease to be the Senior Management Personnel of the Company w.e.f close of the business hours of June 30 2025.
2. Appointment of Mr. Ankit Thakral as the Chief Financial Officer (Key Managerial Personnel) and designated as the Senior Management Personnel of the Company w.e.f from July 01 2025 as recommended by the Nomination and Remuneration Committee and Audit Committee.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in its meeting held on May 29 2025 have approved the following:
1. Investment for an amount upto Rs. 0.51 crores (approx) to acquire stake in the equity share capital of AMPIN C&I Private Limiteds subsidiary which is yet to be incorporated (the Special  Purpose Vehicle)
2. Incorporation of 2 (Two) Wholly owned subsidiary companies in the name of "Lumax Auto Solutions Private Limited" and "Lumax Auto Comp Private Limited" or any other name as may be approved by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs Office of the Registrar of Companies Central Registration Centre

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Fixation Of Record Date As August 07 2025 For The Purpose Of Determining The Shareholders Eligible To Receive Dividend On The Equity Shares For The Financial Year 2024-25 And Tuesday August 19 2025 As The "Cut-Off Date" For The Purpos
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 42 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 the Board has approved the Fixation of Record date as August 07 2025 for the purpose of determining the shareholders eligible to receive dividend on equity shares for FY 2024-25 and cut-off date as August 19 2025 for determining the shareholders eligible to vote at the resolutions set out in the Notice of the Annual General Meeting (AGM) or to attend the AGM.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their meeting held today have approved the following:
1. Cessation of Mr. Ashish Dubey as the Chief Financial Officer (KMP) of the Company consequent to attaining the age of superannuation w.e.f the close of business hours of June 30 2025.
2. Appointment of Mr. Ankit Thakral as Chief Financial Officer (Key Managerial Personnel) of the Company with effect from July 01 2025 as recommended by Nomination and Remuneration Committee.
3.  Re-appointment of Grant Thornton Bharat LLP as Internal Auditors for FY 2025-26
4. Re-appointment of M/s. Jitender Navneet & Co. Cost Accountants as Cost Auditors for FY 2025-26.
5. Appointment of Mr. Maneesh Gupta Practicing Company Secretary as Secretarial Auditors for five consecutive years from FY 2025-26 till FY 2029-30 subject to approval of the shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: Recommendation of Final Dividend of Rs. 5.50 per equity share (275%) of the face value of Rs 2/- for the financial year 2024-25 subject to the approval of the shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting of the Company
